question: [File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/storage.move] [Function: increase_total_supply_balance()] [Supply Inflation] Can increase_total_supply_balance() inflate total_supply without increasing individual user balances, breaking sum invariant? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/storage.move] [Function: decrease_total_supply_balance()] [Supply Deflation] Can decrease_total_supply_balance() reduce total_supply below sum of user balances, causing withdrawal failures when total appears insufficient? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/storage.move] [Function: update_user_loans()] [Duplicate Loan] Can asset be added to user_info.loans vector multiple times if vector::contains() check on line 589 races with push_back, causing duplicate entries? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/storage.move] [Function: update_user_loans()] [Vector Growth DoS] Can attacker repeatedly borrow and repay to inflate loans vector length to thousands of entries, causing DoS on future operations that iterate the vector? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/storage.move] [Function: remove_user_loans()] [Index Race] Can vector::index_of() on line 597 return stale index if loans vector is modified between index lookup and vector::remove, deleting wrong asset? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/storage.move] [Function: remove_user_loans()] [Silent Failure] Does remove_user_loans() silently succeed when asset doesn't exist in loans vector (line 598-600), potentially masking logic errors in caller? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/storage.move] [Function: update_user_collaterals()] [Duplicate Collateral] Can same asset be added multiple times to collaterals vector if concurrent calls to update_user_collaterals bypass vector::contains check? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/storage.move] [Function: update_user_collaterals()] [Vector Growth DoS] Can collaterals vector grow unbounded through repeated deposit/withdraw cycles, causing gas exhaustion when calculating total collateral value? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/storage.move] [Function: remove_user_collaterals()] [Index Race] Can stale index from vector::index_of() on line 623 cause wrong collateral to be removed if vector is modified between lookup and remove operations? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/storage.move] [Function: remove_user_collaterals()] [Collateral Stuck] Does remove_user_collaterals() fail to actually remove user_info entry when both collaterals and loans vectors are empty, wasting storage forever? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/storage.move] [Lines: 577-592] [Initialization Race] Can update_user_loans() race with update_user_collaterals() when both are called for new user, causing one UserInfo struct to overwrite the other's data? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/storage.move] [Function: get_user_assets()] [Missing Data] Does get_user_assets() returning empty vectors when user doesn't exist prevent distinguishing between 'no account' vs 'account with no assets', causing logic errors? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/storage.move] [Lines: 365-372] [Vector Ownership] Are collaterals and loans vectors returned by reference or copied, and can external code mutate returned vectors to corrupt user_info state? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/storage.move] [Function: withdraw_treasury()] [Rounding Manipulation] Can ray_mul(scaled_treasury_value, supply_index) on line 649 round down while ray_div(withdrawable_value, supply_index) on line 654 rounds down again, causing attacker to extract more treasury than available through repeated small withdrawals? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/storage.move] [Function: withdraw_treasury()] [Index Stale] Can supply_index retrieved on line 642 be stale if update_state() hasn't been called recently, causing treasury_value calculation to underestimate actual treasury, allowing over-withdrawal? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/storage.move] [Function: withdraw_treasury()] [Normal Amount Precision Loss] Does pool::normal_amount(pool, amount) conversion on line 646 lose precision for tokens with decimals < 9, allowing withdrawal of more raw tokens than intended? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/storage.move] [Function: withdraw_treasury()] [Unnormal Amount Error] Can pool::unnormal_amount(pool, withdrawable_value) on line 659 overflow u64 when withdrawable_value is large u256, wrapping to small amount and under-withdrawing treasury? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/storage.move] [Function: withdraw_treasury()] [Total Supply Desync] Does decrease_total_supply_balance() on line 656 correctly mirror the pool withdrawal, or can mismatch cause total_supply to be less than actual supplied value? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/storage.move] [Function: withdraw_treasury()] [Reentrancy Risk] Can pool::withdraw_reserve_balance() on line 661-667 call back into storage module through custom CoinType transfer hooks, enabling reentrancy to withdraw treasury multiple times? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/storage.move] [Function: withdraw_treasury()] [Event After State] Does emitting WithdrawTreasuryEvent after actual withdrawal on line 670 allow external observers to front-run subsequent operations based on event data? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/storage.move] [Function: withdraw_treasury()] [Min Function Bypass] Can min(withdraw_amount, treasury_value) on line 650 be bypassed by passing amount=0 and relying on treasury_value to withdraw all treasury in single call? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/storage.move] [Function: withdraw_treasury()] [Type Mismatch Check] Can get_coin_type() string comparison on line 640 be fooled by CoinType with identical string representation but different actual type, allowing cross-asset treasury theft? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/storage.move] [Function: withdraw_treasury()] [Recipient Validation] Is recipient address validated to not be system address or zero address, or can treasury funds be burned by sending to 0x0? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/storage.move] [Function: withdraw_treasury()] [Pool ID Leakage] Does exposing pool UID in WithdrawTreasuryEvent on line 675 leak sensitive information that can be used to target pool manipulation attacks? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/storage.move] [Function: withdraw_treasury()] [Multiple Cap Requirement] Can requirement for both StorageAdminCap and PoolAdminCap be exploited where one is held by protocol and other by DAO, creating deadlock if either refuses to sign?
